text: afmn hssan lah alshaytan 'aemalah alsayiyat min measy allah walkfr webadt ma dunih min alalihat walawthan farah hsnana jamilana kman hdah allah teala, fraa alhasan hsnana walsyy syyana? fa'iina allah yudilu man yasha' min ebadh, wayahdi man ysha', fala tuhlk nafsak hznana ealaa kafar hwla' aldalyn, 'iina allah ealim bqbayhhm wsyjazyhm ealayha 'aswa aljza'
